subject: The most cinematic video model yet—now in FLORA
body:

** Lights, camera, FLORA.
------------------------------------------------------------
https://x.com/florafaunaai/status/1912644921854685227

The most cinematic video model yet has arrived.

Kling 2.0 Master is now available in FLORA—bringing fluid, expressive motion to both text-to-video and image-to-video workflows.

This model understands the rhythm of a scene:
— Camera glides and subtle expressions
— Complex, dynamic motion
— Lifelike characters and cinematic light

Direct your vision. Watch it unfold.
Create with Kling 2.0 Master (https://www.florafauna.ai/projects)
